name: template-app
description: Basic Hello World app for testing

scripts.dev: npm run prisma-generate && nodemon --watch app/src --ext js,scss,html,njk --exec "npm run start"
scripts.test: npm run prisma-generate && cross-env NODE_ENV=test NODE_OPTIONS=--experimental-vm-modules npx jest
scripts.db:seed: npm run prisma-generate && npx prisma db seed
scripts.coverage: npm run prisma-generate && cross-env NODE_ENV=test NODE_OPTIONS=--experimental-vm-modules npx jest --coverage
